p: Out of 504,771 mosquitoes collected in Gravitraps deployed by NEA in Singaporeâ€™s high-rise public apartment blocks in 2018, the predominant mosquito species was Ae. aegypti (80% of all captures). However, a total of 1,931 Ae. malayensis (0.38%) were caught in 1,741 traps. The average capture rate was 0.0013 Ae. malayensis per trap and per week, with an average of 1.1 specimen per Ae. malayensis-positive trap.
